title: Tour Daily Podcast, stage 6: Break or no break?
content:
Stage 6 introduced some crucial questions about the green jersey competition and the M-word record.

At 249 km stage 7 is the longest stage at the Tour de France in the last 20 years, and it’s not flat. The Classics guys could thrive in the finale, making for an interesting fight for the breakaway.

Never miss an episode. Subscribe to our CyclingTips Podcast on iTunes, Spotify,  Google or wherever you get your podcasts.
author: Abby Mickey
